Package org.lwjgl.bullet

Class B3DynamicsInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bullet.B3DynamicsInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class B3DynamicsInfo
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Layout

    
 struct b3DynamicsInfo {
     double m_mass;
     double m_localInertialDiagonal[3];
     double m_localInertialFrame[7];
     double m_lateralFrictionCoeff;
     double m_rollingFrictionCoeff;
     double m_spinningFrictionCoeff;
     double m_restitution;
     double m_contactStiffness;
     double m_contactDamping;
     int m_activationState;
     double m_angularDamping;
     double m_linearDamping;
     double m_ccdSweptSphereRadius;
     double m_contactProcessingThreshold;
     int m_frictionAnchor;
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • B3DynamicsInfo

        public B3DynamicsInfo​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a B3DynamicsInfo instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
